short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AskPaper is an highly customizable research tool designed to provide quick and accurate information from websites and PDF documents

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AskPaper is an innovative and highly customizable research tool designed to provide quick and accurate information from websites and PDF documents. It offers users the ability to ask questions and receive intelligent, comprehensive responses based on the content of the source material.
